summary: I WAS DRIVING AND WENT TO PASS ANOTHER VEHICLE. MY CHECK ENGINE LIGHT BEGAN TO FLASH AND MY VEHICLE SUFFERED AN IMMEDIATE POWER LOSS. DEALERSHIP HAS INFORMED ME THAT THERE IS NO FIX AND THAT THIS WAS AN ONGOING ISSUE/INVESTIGATION WITH NHTSA? THIS SUDDEN LOSS OF POWER LEAVES DRIVERS IN A VERY UNSAFE POSITION. THIS IS A BRAND NEW VEHICLE AND FORD IS OF NO HELP.   *TR
